message:
I feel I've exhausted my Google search powers. I'm looking for a definitive list of JS easings functions (js ports from Robert Penner). Similar to what is found here:
https://github.com/ded/emile/blob/master/src/easings.js
and here
http://sandbox.kendsnyder.com/easing/js/transitions.js
and preferably *NOT* functions that are not based on 5 argument signatures like the jQuery easings: 
http://commadot.com/jquery/easing.php
But rather single "position" based

and of course, your core file: https://github.com/madrobby/scripty2/blob/master/src/effects/transitions/penner.js
good stuff. thanks
http://scripty2.com/doc/scripty2%20fx/s2/fx/transitions.html comes with interactive demos and the functions all just take one argument
cool. actually, this file here is really hepful: https://github.com/madrobby/scripty2/blob/master/src/effects/transitions/transitions.js
If you want emulate webkit's hw accel, try https://github.com/madrobby/scripty2/blob/master/src/effects/transitions/cubic-bezier.js
